title: Reds sign Balfour to one-year deal
subtitle: Reds sign Balfour to one-year deal
body: General manager Dan O'Brien has said countless times before that his small-market team must be willing to roll the dice on players coming off injuries. Enter Grant Balfour. The Reds signed the right-handed Balfour, who missed all of 2005 after having Tommy John surgery performed on his throwing elbow, to a one-year contract Thursday with the hope he'll rejuvenate his career in Cincinnati. Anthony Castrovince is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Anthony Castrovince
